A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Aside from the giant plot holes created by completely ignoring EVERYTHING the force awakens built upon and taking a giant dump on the legacy of Luke Skywalker it was still a sub par scifi action flick. They slapped in a 3rd movie ending to the second movie in the series just so they could kill off Luke. Literally every question I was left with after TFA was answered in the most half a$$ed way possible.

Who is Snoke? Nobody
Who are Reys parent's? Nobody
Will Luke train Rey to fight the first Order? Half A$$ed
Why does Anakins lightsaber call to Rey? No Reason

When Luke threw his father's lightsaber over his shoulder I didn't know he was also throwing away every plot point  from TFA over his shoulder also. Two years of waiting and Disney couldn't even answer the plot questions they created. As a life long fan this will be the last SW I watch in theaters i was so disappointed.
